title: Review: Insta360 Ace Pro 2 Uses 8K and AI for Epic Video
content:
You don’t need 8k but what if you used an 8k sensor to get better 4k video? That’s the idea behind the new Insta360 Ace Pro 2.

Read the full article at Review: Insta360 Ace Pro 2 Uses 8K and AI for Epic Video on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
